basics.name: Muhammad Amir Iqbal
basics.summary: Amir has a masters degree in computer science and has been programming since 1997. He has taught undergraduate computer science students and has extensive project management experience. Amir loves programming and has been working in the machine learning domain since 2017.

work.name: Educative
work.summary: Leading online learning platform made by developers, created for developers. Free Trial. Text-based courses with embedded coding environments help you learn without the fluff.
highlights: Task and people management for a team of software engineers working as technical content developers

education.institution: National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences (NU-FAST). Lahore Pakistan

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
